name: world-of-rim-root

scripts.start: bun run build:mod && bun run start:game
scripts.build:mod: dotnet build ./mod/WorldOfRimMod.csproj -c Release && pwsh -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/RimWorld/Mods/WorldOfRim/Assemblies' -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path './mod/bin/Release/net472/WorldOfRimMod.dll' -Destination 'C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/RimWorld/Mods/WorldOfRim/Assemblies/WorldOfRimMod.dll' -Force"

description: Scripts racine pour orchestrer le build du mod RimWorld.
author: World Of Rim Team
